entities.name: bogrod
entities.description: Bogrod is mentioned as someone who will be able to release the trio from a situation.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a person who is with Ron and is trying to help them in their situation.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the trio who are trapped in a vault.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the trio who are trapped in a vault.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the trio who are trapped in a vault.

relationships.description: Griphook believes that Bogrod will be able to release them from their situation.
Ron and Hermione are together in the vault, examining objects.
Harry is informed by Griphook that they have added Germino and Flagrante Curses.
Hermione was affected by the Germino and Flagrante Curses.
